list.name: CHAIN-REACTION
list.description: Each opponent within the area of a Sticky Blomb's explosion increases the Blomb's damage by x%.
list.descriptionHtml: Each opponent within the area of a Sticky Blomb's explosion increases the Blomb's damage by x%.

list.name: SUPER-STICKY
list.description: Secondary Sticky Blomb explosions from Squeak's Super also slow down opponents for x seconds.
list.descriptionHtml: Secondary Sticky Blomb explosions from Squeak's Super also slow down opponents for x seconds.
